description:
This week`s theme is sleep disorders. Does your sleep become more shallow with age? Also, what are "early awakening" and "Awakening Mid-Way"?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: How Do You Remedy a Sleep Disorder?
Qu’est-ce que le trouble du sommeil ?
Suimin Shougai o Kazen Suru ni wa?
睡眠障害を改善するには?
